Description: Book of the Dead of Tentosorkon with brilliantly painted vignettes; frame 3.
Curator's comments: Green in Davies, Colour and Painting, London 2001, p. 45, col. pl. 10 [2]. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 114, 116. Lenzo, G. 2023. The Book of the Dead in the Third Intermediate Period, in: Lucarelli, R. and M.A. Stadler (eds), The Oxford Handbook of the Egyptian Book of the Dead (online edn, Oxford Academic, 20 June 2023), 87.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (133574) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/133574)
